text: The 1942 Colorado Buffaloes football team was an American football team that represented the University of Colorado during the 1942 college football season. Head coach James J. Yeager led the team to a 5–1 mark in the MSC and 7–2 overall. ==References== Colorado Category:Colorado Buffaloes football seasons Category:Mountain States Conference football champion seasons Colorado Buffaloes football
title: 1942 Colorado Buffaloes football team
